name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe
description: A bright, medium-bodied coffee with distinct floral and citrus notes.

name: Colombian Supremo
description: A smooth, well-balanced coffee with notes of nuts and chocolate.

name: Sumatra Mandheling
description: A rich, full-bodied coffee with earthy and spicy undertones.

name: Costa Rican Tarrazu
description: A sweet, bright coffee with a crisp acidity and honeyed finish.

name: Guatemalan Antigua
description: A velvety coffee with rich chocolate undertones and a hint of spice.

name: Kenyan AA
description: A lively coffee with pronounced berry flavors and bright acidity.

name: Hawaiian Kona
description: A smooth, mild coffee with a delicate sweetness and buttery texture.

name: Brazilian Santos
description: A mellow coffee with nutty flavors and a smooth chocolate finish.

name: Tanzanian Peaberry
description: A bright, fruity coffee with floral aromatics and a crisp finish.

name: Papua New Guinea Sigri
description: A complex coffee with earthy flavors and a hint of tropical fruit.

name: Jamaican Blue Mountain
description: An exceptionally smooth coffee with mild acidity and sweet, floral notes.

name: Mexican Chiapas
description: A gentle coffee with nutty undertones and a light citrus finish.

name: Indian Monsooned Malabar
description: A mellow, earthy coffee with low acidity and spicy hints.

name: Rwandan Bourbon
description: A sweet coffee with bright strawberry notes and floral aroma.

name: Burundi Kayanza
description: A lively coffee with red fruit notes and a creamy body.

name: Yemeni Mocha
description: A complex coffee with chocolate undertones and wine-like acidity.

name: Sulawesi Toraja
description: A heavy-bodied coffee with savory notes and a smooth finish.

name: Panamanian Geisha
description: An exquisite coffee with jasmine aroma and tropical fruit flavors.

name: Nicaraguan Maragogipe
description: A rare coffee with large beans, sweet aroma, and mild acidity.

name: Bolivian Caranavi
description: A bright coffee with citrus notes and a smooth, clean finish.

name: Ethiopian Sidamo
description: A delicate coffee with tea-like body and floral overtones.

name: Colombian Huila
description: A crisp coffee with apple-like acidity and a chocolaty finish.

name: Costa Rican Tarrazu Honey
description: A sweet coffee fermented with honeyed mucilage for rich, fruity notes.

name: Tanzanian Peaberry Natural
description: A sun-dried coffee with intense fruit flavor and smooth body.

name: Guatemalan Huehuetenango
description: A bright coffee with complex citrus and berry flavors.

name: Kenyan Peaberry
description: A unique coffee with intense sweetness and vibrant acidity.

name: Brazilian Bourbon
description: A sweet coffee with caramel and nutty flavors, smooth mouthfeel.

name: Mexico Altura
description: A mild coffee with soft acidity and light chocolate notes.

name: Indonesian Aceh Gayo
description: A full-bodied coffee with herbal notes and a long, smooth finish.

name: Panama Boquete
description: A bright coffee with floral aromas and delicate fruit sweetness.
